title: Project 521
description: A science fiction story exploring consciousness, simulation theory, and the nature of reality through the lens of a Mars colony research project.

world.title: Project 521 Universe
world.description: A near-future world where humanity has colonized Mars and made a discovery that challenges the nature of reality itself.

productions.title: Project 521: The Discovery
productions.description: The main narrative following the Mars research team's discovery and its implications
